CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 23, 1957, pg. A8, reads: "Skillful Art Students - The art classes, under the direction of Miss Broskey, are working on special projects for the show cases at South High School.  These young people are permitted to work on any project they desire.  With a newly remodeled room, and the necessary supplies with which to work, many of these students have been helped to win art honors. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Teacher Ms Broskey leaning over table with students working on art projects in classroom at South High School
